medical_history.chief_complaint: Gradual onset diffuse abdominal pain, intensified and migrated to the RLQ.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning at 0200 with vague abdominal pain that gradually intensified and shifted to the RLQ. The patient took a single dose of Norfloxacin without relief. The last meal was at 10 PM yesterday. He denies constipation, diarrhea, emesis, night sweats, chills but endorses subjective fevers and diminished appetite. No dysuria, hematuria, urgency, frequency, lightheadedness, or dizziness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history includes anxiety; otherwise, no prior surgical history.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of inflammatory bowel disease.
